mapper.select: select a.ADMIN_QnA_TITLE, a.ADMIN_QnA_CONTENT, a.ADMIN_QnA_REG_DATE, c.BOARD_QnA_NO, c.BOARD_QnA_TYPE, c.BOARD_QnA_TITLE, c.BOARD_QnA_CONTENT, c.BOARD_QnA_FILEPATH, c.BOARD_QnA_REG_DATE, c.CUSTOMER_ID from BOARD_QnA_ADMIN as a, BOARD_QnA_CM as c where c.BOARD_QnA_NO=#{BOARD_QnA_NO} and a.BOARD_QnA_NO=#{BOARD_QnA_NO}
